languages.text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса направлен словно сквозь вас, а лицо напряжено почти до судороги. Он молча кивает вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса направлен словно сквозь вас, а лицо напряжено почти до судороги. Он молча кивает вам.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса направлен словно сквозь вас, а лицо напряжено почти до судороги. Он молча кивает вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希的目光似乎直接穿过了你，但他的脸却紧绷得仿佛要抽筋一般。他一言不发，朝你点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的目光似乎直接穿过了你，但他的脸却紧绷得仿佛要抽筋一般。他一言不发，朝你点了点头。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Heinrix parece atravesarte, pero su cara está tan tensa que casi se contorsiona. Asiente sin decir nada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Heinrix parece atravesarte, pero su cara está tan tensa que casi se contorsiona. Asiente sin decir nada.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの視線はあなたをまっすぐ見通すようであったが、その表情は痙攣するほどにこわばっていた。彼は無言で頷いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの視線はあなたをまっすぐ見通すようであったが、その表情は痙攣するほどにこわばっていた。彼は無言で頷いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' starrer Blick scheint geradewegs durch dich hindurchzugehen, doch sein Gesicht ist derart angespannt, dass es fast zuckt. Er nickt dir wortlos zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' starrer Blick scheint geradewegs durch dich hindurchzugehen, doch sein Gesicht ist derart angespannt, dass es fast zuckt. Er nickt dir wortlos zu.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Heinrix semble perdu dans le lointain, mais ses traits sont tellement tendus que vous ne seriez pas {mf|surpris|surprise} qu'il soit subitement pris de convulsions. Sans prononcer le moindre mot, il vous adresse un simple signe de tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Heinrix semble perdu dans le lointain, mais ses traits sont tellement tendus que vous ne seriez pas {mf|surpris|surprise} qu'il soit subitement pris de convulsions. Sans prononcer le moindre mot, il vous adresse un simple signe de tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bir yandan sana bakmazmış gibi dururken bir yandan da yüzü seğirecek kadar gergin görünüyor. Hiçbir şey söylemeden başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's stare seems to pass straight through you, but his face is tense almost to the point of twitching. He nods wordlessly to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix neredeyse sana bakmıyor gibi ama yüzü seğirecek kadar da gergin görünüyor. Hiçbir şey söylemeden başını sallıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
